Question.Subject: Username idea for dailybooth?
Question.Content: My name is Chrissy, obviously, and i need an idea for a name on dailybooth. I want my name in it :P im not that creative.
Question.ChosenAnswer: chrissy_ don't make it too complicated, people won't be able to remember it, it's best to just keep it simple (: because you can obviously change your user-name, just like twitter, but you wouldn't want to do that cause you'd lose all your mentions which is no fun :( so stick with something simple & let your pictures be the creative part [;
Question.ChosenAnswererNick: a u b r e y

Answer.Content: chrissy_ don't make it too complicated, people won't be able to remember it, it's best to just keep it simple (: because you can obviously change your user-name, just like twitter, but you wouldn't want to do that cause you'd lose all your mentions which is no fun :( so stick with something simple & let your pictures be the creative part [;
Answer.UserNick: a u b r e y
